name: Basepilot
headline: AI coworkers to automate browser work, in minutes.
description:
Basepilot builds AI coworkers that collaborate with humans to automate work across the browser. They learn from what you do and you can teach them new skills, just by demonstration. Companies using Basepilot save 30% of their time and resources per week, freeing up time for more high-value tasks.

Basepilot is founded by Ken, who previously led a fintech-product to 3M users in <12 months, and Pascal, who worked on robotics & self-driving at Carnegie Mellon and Mercedes-Benz Research.

Interested to try it out? Get started here: https://www.basepilot.com/ 

YC Launch: https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/KcS-basepilot-your-ai-employee-to-automate-repetitive-browser-work-in-minutes
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:no-code; industry:automation; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ken Hendricks, Founder
founders.description:
I‚Äôm Ken, co-founder and CEO of Basepilot. We build AI coworkers that collaborate with humans to automate work. 

Prior to Basepilot, I led product at a B2B fintech startup and grew it to 3M users in <12 months, with customers like Visa and Bank of America. Before that, I built a computer vision startup out of university that reached $250K ARR with partnerships like Deloitte, KPMG, EY and BMW. 

Born in Mumbai, brought up in New Zealand, before moving to SF. Studied Mechatronics eng.

founders.name: Pascal Wieler, Founder
founders.description:
Hi! I'm Pascal, Co-founder of Basepilot. I grew up in Germany.

Passionate about AI agents, robotics & outdoor sports ü§ñüöµ. Studied CS MSc. @CMU MLD & KIT. Previously, I co-founded a robotics startup, did research in robotic manipulation & imitation learning at Carnegie Mellon, and worked on self-driving cars at Mercedes-Benz. Excited to be a part of YC, let's chat!

# Your AI operations team to automate back-office work
Grow, cut costs and improve efficiency across back-office operations. Automate work in logistics, insurance & financial services, within minutes.
[Get started](https://www.basepilot.com/<https:/j8d68kyt9y4.typeform.com/to/jk3QQCeZ>)
[Book a demo](https://www.basepilot.com/<https:/calendar.app.google/K8XyasjaaY92qpev9>)

## Insurance operations on auto-pilot
Resource-intensive insurance operations automated to scale operations, save cost and increase efficiency - from document processing and underwriting to billing.‍Works across your insurance software stack.
Renewals & policy admin
Claims & FNOL processing
Invoicing, quoting & payments
Applications & document processing

generated_description:
Basepilot is a fresh entrant in the automation landscape, founded in 2024 and hailing from Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch W24. The company is on a mission to develop AI coworkers that seamlessly assist humans by automating repetitive browser tasks in mere minutes. How do they achieve this? By learning from your actions and picking up new skills through simple demonstrations‚Äîmuch like how you teach a colleague.

The brains behind Basepilot are Ken, a proven leader who scaled a fintech product to 3 million users in under a year, and Pascal, who brings deep expertise from his work on robotics at Carnegie Mellon and Mercedes-Benz Research. Together, they form a compact but capable team located in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco.

So, what‚Äôs in it for companies? Users of Basepilot report saving up to 30% of their weekly time and resources. This translates to more bandwidth for high-value tasks that truly require human creativity and judgment. Picture automating tedious workflows in logistics, insurance, and financial services‚Äîall while maintaining control and accuracy across processes.

Basepilot‚Äôs offerings are designed for diverse industries, transforming back-office operations by freeing up your team's capacity without the need for additional headcount. Processes like document handling in insurance and order fulfillment in logistics become efficient and nearly error-free, completed in a fraction of the time it would normally take. 

If you're curious to see how Basepilot can streamline your operations, you can start your journey or book a demo [here](https://www.basepilot.com/). Remember, in a world where time equates to money, automating the mundane is a step toward unlocking your team's full potential. 

**Explore more about Basepilot and what they offer on their [official website](https://www.basepilot.com/) or check out their YC launch page for more insights.**
